availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas W. Price (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Emily Hutchens Price in Nelson County, Kentucky, on September 7, 1858. Father of Farmer in Nelson County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson, District 1, p. 132.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, Film #000481488.
Find A Grave, "Thomas W. Price ( August 21, 1817 - February 20, 1891)," Memorial #99359729, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/99359729 (accessed June 22, 2017).
